channel.title: RoatPkz | 24/7 | PK | Spawn & Master | Lots of Players | Strong VPS |
channel.description:
[center][img]http://i54.tinypic.com/2a7ar2u.jpg[/img]
[url=http://www.roatpkz.com/webclient][img]http://img26.imageshack.us/img26/6781/donates.gif[/img] [/url][url=http://www.roatpkz.com/download][img]http://img833.imageshack.us/img833/6066/downloadujq.gif[/img] [/url][url=http://www.roatpkz.com/donate][img]http://img834.imageshack.us/img834/9031/donate1.gif[/img] [/url][url=http://www.roatpkz.com/hiscore/][img]http://img341.imageshack.us/img341/1676/hiscore.gif[/img][/url]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/HrI1b.png[/img][/center]
[b]About[/b]
RoatPkz is a fun server, where you can basically login and PK straight away! On RoatPkz, you have the option to spawn items, as well as having the option to change your levels and stats! Whether you are a experienced PKer or if you just started PKng, RoatPkz is the right server for you! This server is filled with content and it's enjoyable! There are always people PKing, so why not join in the fun? We have a nice and friendly community, and at RoatPkz, you can become one of the best PKers! There is no other place like RoatPkz. The home for this server is Edgeville. RoatPkz is a unique server due to the fact that we have a friendly and charming community. RoatPkz has the potential to be one of the best servers in history, it's just we need more players! There are many PK hotspots scattered around everywhere in RoatPkz, ranging from Mage Bank, Edgeville, Ice Plateau and many more places! RoatPkz has been up for a very long time. At one stage, RoatPkz hit a personal best of 140 players on at one time! Why not give RoatPkz a chance? I can guarantee you will love the server! We are more than a server, we are a family.
[b]Why should I join?[/b]
Why shouldn't you join, is the question you should be asking yourself! RoatPkz is a fun enjoyable server where you can always PK, no matter what! The server is packed with content, and this server is not buggy! There are professional staffs on this server that will always help you. The second you log in, you can automatically PK. You can gear up in less than 20 seconds here on RoatPkz! There is no lag on this server, and this server is 24/7. This server is based on PKing and staking. You don't have to be good at it! You can learn it all here on RoatPkz. So what are you waiting for! Click the "Play Now" button at the top of this thread!
[b]Features[/b]
[ul][li]Vote4PKP & Accumulate Vote Points for Loyalty Titles.[/li] [li]Professional Staff Team. Staff team are all mature, non-abusive, active and dedicated[/li] [li]20mb cache[/li] [li]Automatic donation system with special perks in-game[/li] [li]Flawless PKing. PK to your hearts content! Gear up in less than 30 seconds[/li] [li]A special tab, where you can easily spawn sets of items, including Barrows and other supplies[/li] [li]Hotkeys for ease of access[/li] [li]100% Rocktail and Overload effects.[/li] [li]2006 PK Oldschool Zone[/li] [li]100% Magic, which includes Lunar spells, ancient spells and normal spells[/li] [li]Perfect Switching - Hybrid/Tribrid as you please[/li] [li]PKP shop, that holds many items that are special![/li] [li]Fully working Duel Arena - stake your rare items![/li] [li]Spawn Commands, as well as Master, Pure, Zerker & Tank commands![/li] [li]No lag, and the server is 24/7! Strong VPS![/li] [li]Custom Capes for the donators with special effects; Dragon, Water and Earth Cape, each with bonuses.[/li] [li]Imbued Rings; Warrior Ring(i), Berserker Ring (i), Archer Ring(i) and Seers Ring(i)[/li] [li]Webclient and a Downloadable Client![/li] [li]FunPK - a place where you can PK as much as you want, without losing your items![/li] [li]Master Zone - a place where only players with 1,000 Kills can enter; including boxing zone![/li] [li]All Set Effects work (e.g. Dharoks Set)[/li] [li]x1 and x10 hits, as well as Zoom in and Zoom out buttons![/li] [li]10 Seconds Countdown Timer, after you leave the Wilderness![/li][/ul]
[center][b]ROAT PKZ Videos[/b]
[youtube]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=dS2msy2y3cI[/youtube]
[youtube]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=CX5K54qcTeo[/youtube]
[youtube]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=lJOUxCVWwIY[/youtube]
[center][b]ROAT PKZ Client[/b]
[img]http://img594.imageshack.us/img594/3767/191e7018f6244f2dbaa6434.png[/img]
[center][b]ROAT PKZ Tabs[/b]
[img]http://img197.imageshack.us/img197/7876/d3a5a0d70f214d13a0e3366.png[/img][img]http://img694.imageshack.us/img694/3021/0f21856d094c4adcb5c1f8c.png[/img][img]http://img819.imageshack.us/img819/223/7a6410dbf7594ea8904d8ec.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/AjDNv.png[/img][img]http://img69.imageshack.us/img69/5224/a16ada00a7d84be69b12c05.png[/img][img]http://img807.imageshack.us/img807/7167/tabs.gif[/img]
[center][b]ROAT PKZ Donator Shop & Features[/b]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/n6Hwe5D.png[/img]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/LLbtDxd.png[/img]

[img]http://i.imgur.com/HOdUdXo.png[/img]

[img]http://i.imgur.com/AGVfe.png[/img] [img]http://img19.imageshack.us/img19/2774/591f37a83db0403b936c04c.png[/img]
[center][b]ROAT PKZ Pictures[/b]
[img]http://i53.tinypic.com/2nlfk0l.png[/img]

item.title: RoatPkz | 24/7 | PK | Spawn & Master | Lots of Players | Strong VPS |
item.dc:creator: @J_Dogg11_12 J_Dogg11_12
item.description:
@J_Dogg11_12 wrote:

Combat is awful? I highly disagree. Of the many server’s I’ve played, there are no distinguishable ‘OP’ items, although there are items granting benefits for donators, although it’s still easily possible to kill people with these types of items. I myself played the server for over 6 months before purchasing donator, haha.

OT: Bumping for everyone to come check it out! Had 125 players online the other day, it’s quite the fun! Login, spawn items, and pk to your hearts’ content!

Read full topic

item.title: RoatPkz | 24/7 | PK | Spawn & Master | Lots of Players | Strong VPS |
item.dc:creator: @J_Dogg11_12 J_Dogg11_12
item.description:
@J_Dogg11_12 wrote:

Could you please link me to them? The only one I could find said that it hasn’t been posted on in 120+ days, so I thought it’d be gravedigging if I bumped it. The topic I’ll link you to below is outdated, which may be misleading to newcomers, therefore I have posted a new one.

See here: http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,555250.msg4065276.html#msg4065276
This is why I’ve created a new topic:

Also, if you search the word “Roat”, that’s the only advertisement topic that comes up. I think I know what I was doing when I posted this. Also, I did use SOME of the same pictures, because other content was removed, therefore I had to change it. I do not want new players joining with misleading information.

Appreciate the comments & concerns though.

Read full topic
item.source: RoatPkz | 24/7 | PK | Spawn & Master | Lots of Players | Strong VPS |

There’s already been an Advertisement for this posted previously - using the same pictures. You aren’t allowed to post multiple Topics advertising the same Server. Please remove this now.

This. I am sure I have seen 2-3 other advertisements for this server.

Read full topic

item.description:
@J_Dogg11_12 wrote:

[center]

2a7ar2u.jpg968×175

[/center]

About

RoatPkz is a fun server, where you can basically login and PK straight away! On RoatPkz, you have the option to spawn items, as well as having the option to change your levels and stats! Whether you are a experienced PKer or if you just started PKng, RoatPkz is the right server for you! This server is filled with content and it’s enjoyable! There are always people PKing, so why not join in the fun? We have a nice and friendly community, and at RoatPkz, you can become one of the best PKers! There is no other place like RoatPkz. The home for this server is Edgeville. RoatPkz is a unique server due to the fact that we have a friendly and charming community. RoatPkz has the potential to be one of the best servers in history, it’s just we need more players! There are many PK hotspots scattered around everywhere in RoatPkz, ranging from Mage Bank, Edgeville, Ice Plateau and many more places! RoatPkz has been up for a very long time. At one stage, RoatPkz hit a personal best of 140 players on at one time! Why not give RoatPkz a chance? I can guarantee you will love the server! We are more than a server, we are a family.

Why should I join?

Why shouldn’t you join, is the question you should be asking yourself! RoatPkz is a fun enjoyable server where you can always PK, no matter what! The server is packed with content, and this server is not buggy! There are professional staffs on this server that will always help you. The second you log in, you can automatically PK. You can gear up in less than 20 seconds here on RoatPkz! There is no lag on this server, and this server is 24/7. This server is based on PKing and staking. You don’t have to be good at it! You can learn it all here on RoatPkz. So what are you waiting for! Click the “Play Now” button at the top of this thread!

Features

[ul][li]Vote4PKP & Accumulate Vote Points for Loyalty Titles.[/li]
[li]Professional Staff Team. Staff team are all mature, non-abusive, active and dedicated[/li]
[li]20mb cache[/li]
[li]Automatic donation system with special perks in-game[/li]
[li]Flawless PKing. PK to your hearts content! Gear up in less than 30 seconds[/li]
[li]A special tab, where you can easily spawn sets of items, including Barrows and other supplies[/li]
[li]Hotkeys for ease of access[/li]
[li]100% Rocktail and Overload effects.[/li]
[li]2006 PK Oldschool Zone[/li]
[li]100% Magic, which includes Lunar spells, ancient spells and normal spells[/li]
[li]Perfect Switching - Hybrid/Tribrid as you please[/li]
[li]PKP shop, that holds many items that are special![/li]
[li]Fully working Duel Arena - stake your rare items![/li]
[li]Spawn Commands, as well as Master, Pure, Zerker & Tank commands![/li]
[li]No lag, and the server is 24/7! Strong VPS![/li]
[li]Custom Capes for the donators with special effects; Dragon, Water and Earth Cape, each with bonuses.[/li]
[li]Imbued Rings; Warrior Ring(i), Berserker Ring (i), Archer Ring(i) and Seers Ring(i)[/li]
[li]Webclient and a Downloadable Client![/li]
[li]FunPK - a place where you can PK as much as you want, without losing your items![/li]
[li]Master Zone - a place where only players with 1,000 Kills can enter; including boxing zone![/li]
[li]All Set Effects work (e.g. Dharoks Set)[/li]
[li]x1 and x10 hits, as well as Zoom in and Zoom out buttons![/li]
[li]10 Seconds Countdown Timer, after you leave the Wilderness![/li][/ul]
